Topic: Draw a habitat and the different living things in each
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a picture of a habitat, showing different places on land or in water.
The student can include a variety of plants and animals in their drawing, showing the different kinds of living things found in that habitat.
The student can show different habitats, such as a forest or a pond, and the unique living things in each one.
The student can illustrate patterns by showing how certain plants and animals are found in specific habitats.
The student can compare the diversity of living things in different habitats by including a range of examples in their illustration.
